title: Designing Multimodal PowerPoint Lectures for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Students participate in PowerPoint lectures via personal devices, apply learning through project execution, with multimodal competency reflected in assessments

learning_goals: Students can distinguish and explain two styles (referent, scaffolding) that effectively integrate slide text and verbal explanations
Students can create PowerPoint slides that harmoniously combine text-image-audio modalities when conveying scientific concepts
Students can apply strategies to contextually reorganize slide content to enhance audience understanding during project presentations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
